addProductSql: INSERT INTO product(name, content, stock) VALUES(?, ?, ?)
getProducts: SELECT product_index as productIndex, name, content, stock, createAt, available FROM product order by product_index
getProduct: SELECT product_index as productIndex, name, content, stock, createAt, available FROM product where product_index = ?
updateProduct: UPDATE product SET name = ?, content = ?, stock = ?, available = ? WHERE product_index = ?
